dt-option.name: language.searchPanes.emptyPanes
dt-option.summary: Add internationalisation to the message shown when no panes are displayed

type.description: By setting the `-init languages.searchPanes.emptyPanes` option to a message, if there are no panes to be displayed then this message will be displayed in their place.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init languages.searchPanes.emptyPanes` parameter is `"No SearchPanes"`. This is so that it is easier for devs to realise when there are no SearchPanes to be shown rather than mistaking the lack of a div for an error.
dt-option.description: As standard, SearchPanes will display a message in the div that is meant to hold the panes if there are none to display. If a custom message has been declared then this will be shown in the place of the default message. If the value of `-init languages.searchPanes.emptyPanes` is set to null then the div will not be shown.

example.title: Hide the div that is meant to contain the SearchPanes
